DOC.brief_summary: The aim study analyze efficacy several variation already validate Positive Psychology Intervention ( PPI ) call Best Possible Self , use Information Communication Technologies ( ICT ) general population . Participants randomly assign one 4 condition : BPS PAST condition , BPS PRESENT condition , BPS FUTURE condition , CONTROL condition ( daily activity ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Different Versions Best Possible Self Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: Intervention last 7 day . Participants come laboratory first day , fill assessment questionnaire practice assign exercise . Then , practice assign exercise 6 day home . The main hypothesis three experimental condition enhance wellbeing compare control condition .
DOC.criteria: Participants must 18 year old old . Participants must willing participate study . Participants must computer Internet access email address . To suffer moderate severe depression establish score 20 Beck Inventory Depression ( BDIII ; Beck , 1996 ) .
